name: TheSteve0 (@TheSteve0@data-folks.masto.host)
summary:
@estelle@front-end.social I know you said "and everything" but I really want to put in an extra shout out to miscarriages. 

Pretty common and "normal" but the silence around it brings A LOT of shame. Saw it cause terrible amounts of self-blame in my wife at the time.
